entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being in Gryffindor Tower and enjoying himself during the holidays.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is part of a duo with George and has created the Canary Creams.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is Fred's twin brother and also part of the duo that created the Canary Creams. He confides in Harry about their next project.

relationships.description: Harry is friends with Fred, as they are both part of Gryffindor Tower and enjoy each other's company during the holidays.
Harry is also friends with George, who confides in him about their next project.
Fred and George are twins and brothers.
